articles.title: France sees a slight rebound in Covid-19 with the emergence of ‘Eris’ variant - FRANCE 24 English

articles.title: Perseid meteor shower to light up night sky - BBC
articles.description: Stargazers are preparing for one of the year's most anticipated astronomical events.
articles.content:
Stargazers are in for a treat on Saturday night when the Perseid meteor shower lights up the sky.
